actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two greatclub attacks or two unarmed attacks.

actions.name: Greatclub
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 18 (3d8 + 5 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Unarmed Attack
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 12 (3d4 + 5 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
entries: Ranged atk +8 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 21 (3d10 + 5 damage) bludgeoning damage.
